page.title: 08 Employment out of Polstead.
page.content: Most of the men and many of the women find employment outside Polstead,many commuting to London,Ipswich,Sudbury,and Colchester daily.Occupations include teachers,doctors,dentists,computer programmers,nurses,builders,plumbers, electricians,printers.Many people find part-time work in the village doing housework ,gardening,and casual work in the fields.Young people are having to find employment outside the village.Transport is difficult for them ,if they have no transport ,or a lift from a friendly neighbour,they face a long walk or cycle ride to either of the two main daily 'bus services,north of the area to Ipswich or Sudbury,or south of the area to Colchester.
